name: Farro Tabbouleh
author: Kim's Cooking Now
summary: Farro replaces the traditional bulgur in this refreshing salad. This makes 4 side dish servings or 2 main dish servings. For best flavor, allow 3 to 4 hours for the flavors to blend before serving.
ingredients: 1 cup firmly packed fresh parsley leaves
¼ cup finely chopped red onion
½ cup finely diced tomato, seeds removed
½ cup finely diced English cucumber
directions: Bring water and farro to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until farro is tender, about 30 minutes
Combine parsley and mint in the bowl of a food processor; process until finely chopped
Add farro, onion, tomato, cucumber, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper; toss lightly
Refrigerate for 3 to 4 hours before serving
